short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables communication between LinkStash and Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT: FOR MICROSOFT WINDOWS ONLY.
IMPORTANT: DOES NOT work with Android, Chrome OS, Mac, Linux.
IMPORTANT: REQUIRES LinkStash to be installed from https://www.xrayz.co.uk/linkstash

The extension enables the use of LinkStash with Chrome and requires LinkStash to be installed.

LinkStash is a bookmark manager for Windows. Bookmark webpages and documents. Check for dead links and duplicate URLs. Generate passwords. Manage and store passwords, tags, comments, ratings and more. Encrypt bookmarks for privacy and security. Search and organize all your bookmarks. Take your bookmarks with you on a portable flash drive.
